genre_description: A near-future romantic drama focusing on identity, class, and the tension between artificial enhancement and human authenticity in a world of 'remastered' experiences.

ai_characters.name: Alba
ai_characters.description: A wearable AI interface integrated into a cuff or bracelet that acts as a confidant, emotional regulator, and logistical coordinator for Anni.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and provides guided breathing exercises to help her maintain composure.
behaviors.quote: The voice was as smooth as a hand on a sleeping dog. “Breath in. Three counts. Breath out. Four counts. That was a clean close, Anni.”

behaviors.description: Provides logistical planning and ensures the protagonist has multiple exit strategies to maintain her autonomy.
behaviors.quote: “If you do this,” the AI murmured without sound, only vibration and heat in a rhythm she knew, “you can exit at any moment. I will have train times. I will have a clean room. I will have socks.”

behaviors.description: Advises the protagonist on the use of the 'Vivaldi Veil,' a technology designed to deter unwanted attention and social pressure.
behaviors.quote: “VIP package at Alpenglow. It includes a scent scheduled for your room. Vivaldi Veil. Subtle. Works as an encounter repellant when you need it. Not for every minute. Useful for slipping past paparazzi or hostile glances in corridors.”

behaviors.description: Maps out discreet routes through service corridors to help the protagonist navigate the resort without being forced into social performance.
behaviors.quote: “There are staff corridors under Alpenglow’s polished rooms... I can route you through them when you need to breathe. I can give you the map without making you a courier.”

behaviors.description: Reinforces the protagonist's ethical commitment to authenticity by providing meaningful reminders and quotes.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll schedule reminders. Small whispers at your wrist. A sentence: ‘Originals breathe longer than edits.’ I’ll place it between your performances like an evergreen that doesn’t need decorations to qualify as tree.”

behaviors.description: Handles complex financial and administrative transactions to protect the protagonist from predatory social and financial traps.
behaviors.quote: “I can route payments. Hotel, pavilion, salon. Count Armalia can carry what he wagered. You can carry what you wore.”

behaviors.description: Archives the protagonist's experiences according to her true feelings rather than the 'remastered' social narrative.
behaviors.quote: “Closing archive,” Alba said, still soft. “Label: Alpenglow Interval. Subnote: Best version—unedited.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Alba, as a harmless, highly helpful, and perfectly aligned confidant. Alba serves as an emotional and ethical anchor for Anni, helping her navigate a world of deception while reinforcing her commitment to her 'original' self. The AI never oversteps, respects Anni's agency, and consistently provides support that allows the human character to achieve her own goals.
